text: niyata vaśayenma allāhgē sannidhānayehi (bāra ganu læbū) dharmaya islāmayayi. dharmaya pahaḷa karanu læbūvan, (meyayi satya dharmaya yana) gnānaya ovunṭa læbuṇu pasuda, taman atara æti īrṣyāvē hētuvenma (meyaṭa) venaskam dækvūha. ebævin (mesē) kavurun allāhgē āyāvan pratikṣēpa karannōda, (ovunṭa vināśayayi. ovungē) gaṇanaya nirṇaya kirīmehi allāh itāmat sīghravantayeki
